# DSC-WAV
---
## The Data Science WAV

.pull-left[

![](https://www.nsf.gov/images/logos/NSF_4-Color_bitmap_Logo.png)

]

--

.pull-right[

- Experiential Learning with Local Community Organizations

- 3 years

- 9 institutions

- $1.2 million total

- 25-30 students per semester

- 5 cohorts starting **January 2020**

]


---
## Two related problems

.pull-left[

- Authentic, hands-on experience for data science students

]

--

.pull-right[

- Need for data science among local organizations

]

## WAV teams 

.pull-left[

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/xX1dwuf8LN9YI/giphy.gif)

]

--

.pull-right[

- **W**rangle, **A**nalyze, **V**isualize

- Each team:
    - 4 statistics and data science majors (mostly juniors)
    - 1 faculty mentor
    - 1 **community engagement**-focused student

- `r icon::fa("money-bill")` stipends 

- Direct interface with community-based orgs

- Onboarding workshops emphasizing "soft skills" and collaboration

- Poster sessions

]

---
## Scrum

.pull-left[

![](Scrum1.png)

]

--

.pull-right[

- Scrum and Agile development

- Agile development framework

- Encourages teams to self-organize, learn, and reflect

- Commonly used by software developers in the workforce

]
